channel.title: Please read need help!
channel.description: ok guys when i try to make my own server like download it off "Server downloads" once i get the source and client i try to go on and it says "no responce from login server please try a diffrent world that happens to me with every source and client if you can help please leave your comment below ty for your time ;D

item.title: Please read need help!
item.dc:creator: @teh_new_kid teh new kid
item.description:
@teh_new_kid wrote:

I HAVE JDK AND EVERYTHING ELSE I HAVE JAVA TOO IVE DONE EVERYTHING BUT NONE WORKED :l

Read full topic

item.title: Please read need help!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:6, topic:421562”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=524219.msg3814687#msg3814687 date=1321219789]

or maybe… just maybe, go to client.java and search for server =

Change the IP to 127.0.0.1?

he has it with every server he says, and since most server that are released are already on 127.0.0.1
is it prob just his java

oh didn’t read that lawlz, But if he can load up the client that shouldn’t be the problem :o
Still try it anyways doesn’t hurt to try ^.^
[/quote]
true[/quote]
could be the version of java he’s trying to use in the run.bat

OP: right click your run.bat -client sided- and click edit. You should see something like “C:\Program_Files\Java\jre7\java.exe”
Replace jre7 with whatever version of jre you have

Read full topic
